Interest Rate Risk and Relatively Low Credit Risk.)
The primary objective of the Scheme is to seek to generate returns commensurate with low risk and providing high level of liquidity, through investments made
in debt and money market securities having maturity of 1 business day including TREPS (Tri-Party Repo) and Reverse Repo. However, there is no assurance or
guarantee that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
